nodes.text: A type of transport was utilized by the Republic Military during the Cold War and the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. The transport, which had a hangar bay on either side protected by force fields, saw use on the planet Alderaan as well as the moon Oricon, where at least one of the transports crashed. At least one ship of the same class was part of the Alliance's fleet and participated in the Battle of Zakuul. During the Third Galactic War, one of these ships served as General Ardinondu Dipolus Daeruun's personal flagship.
